hero.tagline: Shaping minds, nurturing faith, building the future
hero.heading: Premium Islamic Education in Uganda
hero.description: Al Hanan Education Centre combines rigorous academics with complete Qur'anic memorization, producing exceptional Muslim leaders.

quranMemorization.title: Qur'an Memorization
quranMemorization.description: Comprehensive Qur'anic memorization program with expert guidance, structured curriculum, and proven success in developing Hafiz students.

islamicExcellence.title: Islamic Excellence
islamicExcellence.description: Deep Islamic theology and religious studies integrated with faith-centered values, discipline, and character development.

holisticDevelopment.title: Holistic Development
holisticDevelopment.description: Learners are shaped into disciplined, excellent thinkers with strong Islamic identity and real-life leadership capabilities.

academicMastery.title: Academic Mastery
academicMastery.description: Full secular curriculum delivered with academic rigor, ensuring learners complete Primary Seven with exceptional performance.

aminaHassan.name: Amina Hassan
aminaHassan.text: My child has grown not just academically, but spiritually. The combination of Qur'anic memorization and excellent academics is unmatched.

drMuhammad.name: Dr. Muhammad Ssali
drMuhammad.text: Al Hanan represents a new generation of African Muslim schools. The commitment to excellence in faith and academics is remarkable.

zainab.name: Zainab Nakigudde
zainab.text: Al Hanan learners are far different from ordinary learners. You can see the discipline, excellence, and faith in everything they do.

about.pageDescription: Learn about our mission, vision, and commitment to Islamic education excellence
about.missionText: To produce exceptional Muslim leaders who excel academically while maintaining strong Islamic values and character.
about.visionText: A world where Muslim students achieve complete Qur'anic memorization alongside academic excellence, becoming pillars of their communities.

academics.pageDescription: Explore our comprehensive academic curriculum combining Islamic education with rigorous secular academics

admissions.pageDescription: Join Al Hanan Education Centre - Apply now for our comprehensive Islamic education program
admissions.heading: Apply to Al Hanan
admissions.description: Begin your journey with us. Al Hanan Education Centre welcomes students of all backgrounds.

homepage.programsDescription: Comprehensive educational pathways combining Qur'anic mastery, Islamic excellence, and academic achievement.
homepage.ctaHeading: Ready to Shape Your Child's Future?
homepage.ctaDescription: Join Al Hanan Education Centre and become part of a faith-centered community dedicated to academic excellence and Qur'anic mastery. Your child's journey to becoming a disciplined, excellent leader with unshakeable faith starts here.
